name: AAKRUTHI

address: 6-3-903/A/A II floor Suryanagar colony, Rajbhavan road

briefDescription: Aakruthi is located at Hyderabad, AP.AAKRUTHI is a civil society organization registered under societies act, established in Hyderabad. AAKRUTHI is composed of a group of professionals in Agriculture, Rural development, Natural resource management, Micro finance and Bankers along with a committed and well trained human force having a common dream of strengthening Indian rural scenario through “Transforming indian agriculture through integration of value chains, technology dissemination, empowered community and natural resource management” i.e., “ Providing support services” i.e., providing all required support services and hand holding the rural communities in terms of agriculture, agri business, natural resource management, livelihood development (farm and non farm), financial inclusion, creation of backward and forward linkages The core areas of organization work includes .. • Agribusiness systems and value chain development • Sustainable agriculture and livelihoods • Farm technology dissemination • Enterprise development • Natural resource management • Organic farming and crop diversification • Financial inclusion • Community empowerment • Water and sanitation • Consultancy and Field studies
